'''Alpha v1.1.2_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on September 23, 2010.<ref>[[wordofnotch:1172759051|Sound, music and Classic]] – The Word of Notch, September 23, 2010</ref> This version is available in the [[launcher]].

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''General'''
* ''Minecraft'' now downloads resources from Amazon S3 cloud storage service, instead of directly from minecraft.net.

== Bugs ==
'''3 bugs reported'''
* Placing a sign on a cactus crashes the game.
* Placing a sign at the world height limit crashes the game.
* Torches can be placed on leaves in "Fast Graphics" mode.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This was the last version to feature the old terrain generator along with the [[Grass Block|bright green grass]], which was an iconic staple of Alpha. 
<!-- * And this is the first version to support applying skins. -->
** In addition, this was the last version in which the [[Far Lands]] would simply not render beyond 32,000,000 blocks out from the center of the map.
** This was also the last version to have [[Java Edition removed features#.22Winter Mode.22 map type|winter mode]].
** This was also the last version to generate monoliths on the terrain.
